Reviews.Title: “Far better than expected after reading reviews on here!”
Reviews.Author: psychpolly
Reviews.Content: prior trip read reviews site genuinely apprehensive arrival discover couple stayed 4 nights choosing hotel central london cheap included breakfast ensuite tiny adequate werent planning spending bathroom towels bed linen undeniably clean hotel shabby attention safe clean main especially reading negative reviews tube station walk buses regular breakfast toast cereal fruit hardly expected english budget hotel customer service lacking werent luxury treatment keys left reception isnt ideal reviewers unfortunate lucky am believer people write review theyve bad experience believe deserved balanced review basic budget hotel centre london avoid youre expecting luxury probably fine safe clean base plus personally am fan brushing teeth whilst sat toilet

Reviews.Title: “VILE”
Reviews.Author: Barbie999
Reviews.Content: basic clean hotel avoid delux single smelt stale cigarettes tiny bathroom smelt stale urine front buliding noisy earplugs required basically bad couldnt sleep share colleague larger unfortunately bed sheets complimentry stains dribble requested sheets changed remade dirty ones request clean sheets 1130pm told phonecall key linen cupboard finally clean sheets own beds midnight honestly worst hotel stayed am basic clean hotel disgusting dated corridors outside smelt cannabis stay cheaper cleaner travel lodges city im bates motel nicer stay

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely bloody awful (and that's being kind)”

Reviews.Content: bigger broom cupboard bathroom absolutely filthy dare shower hotel complimentary stripe snot bathroom door sheets appeared clean bed pillows hard hot noisy night cancelled arrived couldnt afford lose money days arrived pay hotel recommend hotel disliked
